title: "China-Russia Ties At High Level": Xi After Meeting "Old Friend" Putin
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin told Chinese leader Xi Jinping on Wednesday that relations between Beijing and Moscow were stronger than ever before.
summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin told Chinese leader Xi Jinping on Wednesday that relations between Beijing and Moscow were stronger than ever before.

title: "Discussed Global Hotspots": S Jaishankar Meets UN Chief In Kazakhstan
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Wednesday met UN chief Antonio Guterres and discussed global hotspots and their larger implications apart from the reform of the UNSC.
summary: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Wednesday met UN chief Antonio Guterres and discussed global hotspots and their larger implications apart from the reform of the UNSC.

title: Delta Flight Makes Emergency Landing After Passengers Served Spoiled Food
content: The airline has not disclosed how the contamination was detected, nor have they provided information on how many of the 277 passengers consumed the meal.
summary: The airline has not disclosed how the contamination was detected, nor have they provided information on how many of the 277 passengers consumed the meal.

title: "Alarm Bell": UN Rights Chief On Rising Hate Speeches During Elections
content: The UN rights chief voiced alarm Wednesday at a hardening of rhetoric, including hate speech and dehumanising language against migrants and other minorities, linked to elections in Europe and elsewhere.
summary: The UN rights chief voiced alarm Wednesday at a hardening of rhetoric, including hate speech and dehumanising language against migrants and other minorities, linked to elections in Europe and elsewhere.

title: Moscow Swelters At 32 Degree Celsius, Beats Record Set In 1917
content: Moscow and the surrounding region sweltered Wednesday as temperatures soared to levels unseen in over a century, with the state weather monitor warning of dangerously hot nights.
summary: Moscow and the surrounding region sweltered Wednesday as temperatures soared to levels unseen in over a century, with the state weather monitor warning of dangerously hot nights.

title: Ex Pak PM Imran Khan Seeks Permission From Court To Meet His Sons In Jail
content: Pakistan's anti-terrorism court in Rawalpindi has asked the government and jail administration to respond to Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf chief Imran Khan's request to meet his sons, Pakistan-based daily, The Express Tribune reported on Wednesday.
summary: Pakistan's anti-terrorism court in Rawalpindi has asked the government and jail administration to respond to Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf chief Imran Khan's request to meet his sons, Pakistan-based daily, The Express Tribune reported on Wednesday.

title: US Independence Day 2024: What's Open And Closed On July 4th? Check Here
content: Independence Day arrives Thursday and several offices and businesses will be closed to commemorate the holiday.
summary: Independence Day arrives Thursday and several offices and businesses will be closed to commemorate the holiday.

title: Chinese Man Poses As Doctor, Dupes Girlfriend Of Rs 3 Crore
content: During their six-year relationship, Zhang portrayed himself as an obstetrician-gynaecologist at a prestigious Shanghai hospital.
summary: During their six-year relationship, Zhang portrayed himself as an obstetrician-gynaecologist at a prestigious Shanghai hospital.

title: Explained: What Happens In The UK General Election
content: Britain will hold a parliamentary election on July 4 which opinion polls indicate will hand power to Keir Starmer's Labour Party and end 14 years of Conservative Party-led government.
summary: Britain will hold a parliamentary election on July 4 which opinion polls indicate will hand power to Keir Starmer's Labour Party and end 14 years of Conservative Party-led government.

title: "Stop Labour's Supermajority": Rishi Sunak's Final Appeal Ahead Of UK Polls
content: Stop Labour's "supermajority" is the final message UK PM Rishi Sunak is trying to drive home on Wednesday, the final day of campaigning ahead of polling day on Thursday
summary: Stop Labour's "supermajority" is the final message UK PM Rishi Sunak is trying to drive home on Wednesday, the final day of campaigning ahead of polling day on Thursday

title: Key Issues At Stake In The 2024 UK Elections
content: The main opposition Labour party is widely predicted to win and has been determined not to take any risks, making for a lacklustre election campaign.
summary: The main opposition Labour party is widely predicted to win and has been determined not to take any risks, making for a lacklustre election campaign.

title: 20-Year-Old US Man Charged With Killing Mother Over Eviction Notice
content: Shanelle Burns, 43, died of “asphyxiation secondary to manual strangulation” and her death has been ruled a homicide.
summary: Shanelle Burns, 43, died of “asphyxiation secondary to manual strangulation” and her death has been ruled a homicide.

title: UK Polls Set To Deliver More Diverse Parliament, Many British Indian MPs
content: The UK general election is expected to deliver the most diverse Parliament in the country's history, including in the number of parliamentarians of Indian heritage likely to be elected from across the nation.
summary: The UK general election is expected to deliver the most diverse Parliament in the country's history, including in the number of parliamentarians of Indian heritage likely to be elected from across the nation.

title: In Kazakhstan, For SCO Summit, S Jaishankar Pays Tribute To Mahatma Gandhi
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar visited Pushkin Park in Astana on Wednesday, where he paid tribute to the statue of Mahatma Gandhi accompanied by members of the Indian community following his arrival to represent India at the SCO Summit on Jul
summary: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar visited Pushkin Park in Astana on Wednesday, where he paid tribute to the statue of Mahatma Gandhi accompanied by members of the Indian community following his arrival to represent India at the SCO Summit on Jul

title: Marathoner Diagnosed With Cancer, Names Warning Signs Leading To Diagnosis
content: After completing a half-marathon, Govind Sandhu, a TikTok executive from Bondi, revealed his stage four non-Hodgkin's lymphoma diagnosis.
summary: After completing a half-marathon, Govind Sandhu, a TikTok executive from Bondi, revealed his stage four non-Hodgkin's lymphoma diagnosis.

title: Japan Top Court Rules Eugenics Law Unconstitutional, Victims Seek Justice
content: Japan's top court ruled on Wednesday that a defunct eugenics law under which thousands of people were forcibly sterilised between 1948 and 1996 was unconstitutional, local media reported.
summary: Japan's top court ruled on Wednesday that a defunct eugenics law under which thousands of people were forcibly sterilised between 1948 and 1996 was unconstitutional, local media reported.

title: Indonesian Woman Swallowed By Python Near Home, Husband Found Slipper, Pants
content: A woman was found dead inside the belly of a snake after it swallowed her whole in central Indonesia, police said Wednesday, the second python killing in the province in a month.
summary: A woman was found dead inside the belly of a snake after it swallowed her whole in central Indonesia, police said Wednesday, the second python killing in the province in a month.

title: US Economy Faces Recession Risk In Coming Years, Expert Warns
content: The US economy faces recession risks with potential for a 30% stock market drop, according to BCA Research.
summary: The US economy faces recession risks with potential for a 30% stock market drop, according to BCA Research.

title: From Count Binface To Elmo From Muppets: Odd Candidates In UK Polls 2024
content: When either Rishi Sunak or Keir Starmer take to the stage to hail victory in the British election on Friday, they will be joined at their moment of triumph by either a man with a trash can on his head or someone dressed as "Elmo" from the Muppets.
summary: When either Rishi Sunak or Keir Starmer take to the stage to hail victory in the British election on Friday, they will be joined at their moment of triumph by either a man with a trash can on his head or someone dressed as "Elmo" from the Muppets.

title: First-Time Immigrant Voters Hope To Influence Change In UK Elections 2024
content: Voting for the first time in a British election, Prathesh Paulraj and other immigrant voters are excited to take part in the July 4 ballot, hoping they can influence change in the country that they have chosen to call home.
summary: Voting for the first time in a British election, Prathesh Paulraj and other immigrant voters are excited to take part in the July 4 ballot, hoping they can influence change in the country that they have chosen to call home.
